attributes.action: Ensure the removal of the offensive bust of the convicted terrorist Nelson Mandela from outside the Royal Festival Hall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nelson Mandela was convicted of terrorist offences in South Africa in 1964 and sentenced to life imprisonment. At a time when the western world is engaged in a War against Terrorism, and our troops are being killed daily in the fight against international terrorism in Iraq and Afghanistan, it is highly offensive in the extreme that a bust "honouring" this terrorist leader should be allowed to be erected in London. It should removed immediately and replaced by a memorial honouring the victims of international terrorism and those who risk their lives combating this evil.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
